title: S0 security
extract: Secure Hypertext Transfer Protocol (S-HTTP) is an obsolete alternative to the HTTPS protocol for encrypting web communications carried over HTTP. ... For sensitive transactions, such as Internet e-commerce or online access to financial accounts, the browser and server must encrypt this information.
extract_html: Secure Hypertext Transfer Protocol (S-HTTP) is an obsolete alternative to the HTTPS protocol for encrypting web communications carried over HTTP. ... For sensitive transactions, such as Internet e-commerce or online access to financial accounts, the browser and server must encrypt this information.
